content: for the first neck warmer i made i used dk weight yarn in one colour but you can choose the kind of dk yarn you like most you can change colors in every round or use just one color there aren t rules i ve used 130 gr - 300 meters 325 yards it s ok to use a worsted yarn too 5 mm hook or any hooks to meet the gauge needle scissors tape measure stitch markers this neck warmer fits an adult but you can make any other kids sizes using smaller granny squares the final width is approx 38cm 15 the final length is approx 25cm 9 8 the neck s lenght is approx 30cm 11 8 this pattern is customizable and you can add extra length or width as you like
